title: Abstract Syntax Notation X (ASN.X) Representation of Encoding Instructions for the XML Encoding Rules (XER)
abstract:
Abstract Syntax Notation X (ASN.X) is an
Extensible Markup Language (XML) representation for
Abstract Syntax Notation One (ASN.1) specifications.
This document specifies the ASN.X representation of
encoding instructions for the XML Encoding Rules (XER).  This memo defines an Experimental Protocol for the Internet community.
